201502.n: Iterative Software Development for Project Managers

catList: This course aims to develop the project/product and change management skills of the students following the approaches suggested by the iterative and agile software development processes. The methods detailed in Unified Process, Scrum, CMMI, Goal Directed Process and Toyota Production System will be used in the lectures. After finishing the course, the students will have a general understanding of software quality, project/product management requirements and they will able to perform the most important aspects of iterative project management. Additionally, the instructor will share his real world experiences, alternative information technology department organization structures, techniques regarding the office politics and relevant human resources approaches.
